name: Gamble Fight Plus
description: Create your ideal female fighter then bet and battle your way through the ruthless world of underground fighting! Use your battle winnings to customize and enhance your characters in this fast paced action fighting game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Vista, 8, 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX650 or later DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compatible Additional Notes: Gamepad is highly recommended.
